/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/pmatmul.dir/pmatmul.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/pmatmul.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/lib/stubs  -lcudart  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/nvshmem/12/libnvshmem_device.a -lnvidia-ml -lm -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
